news.title: What do Alaskans make of the geopolitical circus arriving in their city?
news.summary: The city of Anchorage is set to host a meeting that could re-shape Europe and global security.

news.title: Suspended Labour councillor cleared of encouraging violent disorder at rally
news.summary: Ricky Jones denied encouraging violent disorder after comments at a counter-protest last year.

news.title: My family may be killed if deported, says son of Afghan caught in UK data breach
news.summary: Documents seen by the BBC suggest he was part of a special forces unit who worked with the British in Afghanistan.

news.title: Full Strictly line-up revealed as final contestants announced
news.summary: Hodor actor Kristian Nairn will be joined by football star Karen Carney and ITV presenter Ross King.

news.title: UK bioethanol industry faces collapse after government rejects rescue
news.summary: Plants in Hull and Redcar have warned they will close without support after deal to allow US ethanol to come in tariff-free.

news.title: Sturgeon book reignites trans row with JK Rowling
news.summary: In her memoir, Sturgeon complains about the Harry Potter author posting a selfie in a T-shirt branding her a "destroyer of women's rights".

news.title: Chinook helicopter was on 'show flight' when it crashed killing 29, ex-RAF pilot says
news.summary: Four crew and 25 passengers were killed when an RAF Chinook struck a hillside in foggy conditions over the Mull of Kintyre in 1994.

news.title: 'It makes me feel horrible': Female PC goes undercover as runner to catch catcallers
news.summary: Surrey Police says no arrests have been made in a campaign to tackle harassment of female runners.

news.title: 'Putin is a master of persuasion' - BBC correspondents discuss summit strategy
news.summary: The BBCâ€™s US and Russia correspondents outline the leaders' different approaches to the high stakes summit on the Ukraine war.

news.title: In maps: The war-ravaged Ukrainian territories at the heart of the Trump-Putin summit
news.summary: Kyiv has rejected ceding territory seized by Russia to secure a ceasefire.
